Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 68th overall pick, by New York (A) in 2012...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/2012, off Jordan Zimmerman (TOR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2012, off Eric Surkamp (TOR)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Tampa Bay on 9/17/2012...
Injured on 5/25/2013 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/3/2013 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (A) on 2/4/2014 (Going to CHA: 2B J. Valdespin. Going to NYA: LF C. Crawford)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Cleveland on 5/30/2019 (Going to CHA: 3B O. Martinez. Going to CLE: 2B J. Valdespin, P J. Hammel, LF W. Jennings)...
Traded from Cleveland to Houston on 1/31/2020 (Going to CLE: RF R. Woolverton. Going to HOU: 2B J. Valdespin)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/7/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $3,332,330 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 7/31/2021...
